mapper.insert: insert into user_room (id, user_id, hotel_id, room_id, numbers, stay_in_time, days) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stayInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user_room set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, numbers = #{numbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stay_in_time = #{stayInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, days = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, hotel_id, room_id, numbers, stay_in_time, days from user_room
